attributes.action: Stop RTC donating council funds supporting a legal challenge against Manston
attributes.additional_details: The majority of local community are in favour of Manston becoming an airport again and the council are using public money to fight a legal challenge against what the majority want
attributes.background: Stop Ramsgate Town Council donating council funds supporting a legal challenge against the government’s decision to grant permission for the development of Manston airport when most of the public want the airport to go ahead.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about use of local authority funds are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
